definition: cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the relationship between the internal opening of the spinal nerve sulcus and the spinal nerve lesion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨颈椎脊神经沟内口与颈神经受嵌压的关系。

sentences.english: Flexion position MRI is an important base of early diagnosis of Hirayama disease.
sentences.chinese: 颈椎屈曲位MRI是本病早期诊断的重要依据。

sentences.english: I highly suspect cervical spondylopathy，but we need you to have an X-ray to make it clear.
sentences.chinese: 我高度怀疑颈椎病，但你要拍个颈椎片才清楚。

sentences.english: I highly suspect cervical spondylopathy，but we need you to have an X-ray to make it clear.
sentences.chinese: 我高度怀疑颈椎病，但你要拍个颈椎片才清楚。

sentences.english: Objective To study the application of anterior cervical plate in the operation of lower cervical injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究颈前路带锁钢板在下颈椎损伤手术中的应用。

sentences.english: There was a correlation between vertebral artery tortuosity and cervical spondylotic change.
sentences.chinese: 椎动脉扭曲与颈椎退行性变有关。

sentences.english: Cervical vertebra is phlogistic besides not able hard work, what should still notice?
sentences.chinese: 颈椎炎除了不能干重活外，还应注意哪些？

sentences.english: The self-made cervical vertebral fusion cage has good biocompatibility.
sentences.chinese: 自制颈椎融合器有较好的生物相容性。

sentences.english: A mouse has the same number of neck vertebrae as a giraffe .
sentences.chinese: 老鼠和长颈鹿的颈椎骨数目相同。

sentences.english: Immediate reconstruction with titanium plate for mandibular defect tumour-surgery;
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨前路钛板在手术治疗颈椎骨折中的作用。

sentences.english: How beneficial is surgery for cervical radiculopathy and myelopathy?
sentences.chinese: 颈椎神经根病变和脊髓病变的手术有多大益处？

sentences.english: Objective To observe the clinical effects of ultrasound treatment in vertebral artery type of cerviˉcal spondylopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察超声治疗椎动脉型颈椎病的临床疗效。

sentences.english: Cervical spondylosis is a very common condition that usually occurs in the second half of life.
sentences.chinese: 颈椎病是非常普遍的情况下通常发生在下半年的生活。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate clinical effects of Chiropractic therapy on Cervical spondylopathy.
sentences.chinese: 目地观察美式正脊治疗椎动脉型颈椎病的疗效。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the relationship betweenneck pain caused by cervical spondylosis and insomnia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨颈椎病颈痛与失眠之间的关系。

sentences.english: Objective The curative effects of vertebroarterial cervical spondylosis treated by hydro acupuncture were observed.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察水针治疗椎动脉型颈椎病的疗效。

definition: thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
to have a stiff neck after sleeping/(of the head) to touch the pillow

definition: sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
